name: Flappy duck DEMO
description:
Use the arrow keys to move the bird.

Up arrow - to flap upwards
Down arrow - to dash downwards
Right arrow - to flap to the left right
Left arrow - to flap to the left

NOTE: You are a rubber duck, so you bounce when colliding with objects.

A flappy bird remix, where you instead are a rubber duck dodging pipes. THIS IS A DEMO.
